Name should not exceed two words

A professional app, the smart and secure solution to manage all your accounts and debts directly from your mobile. \n Extreme ease: A simple and smart interface enables you to record any financial transaction in seconds, and export it to formatted PDF files. \n Comprehensive account management: Create a file for each client, supplier, or personal account and track all their transactions accurately.

To automatically create your country\'s currency, enable the location option. Otherwise, the first currency will be created as "Local", which you can edit later from the currencies option in the side menu.
Free Plan: 100 free transactions!\n Enjoy all the app features with 100 free transactions to try.

Created and developed by: Engineer Salah Ahmed Al-Haddad

- Click the add button at the bottom of the screen to add a new transaction.\n- Long-press on any financial transaction to edit or delete it.\n
You have used all your free transactions.\nYou can now add three transactions as a free daily quota.\nYou can also get more by:
You have used your free daily quota of transactions for today.\nYou can also get more by inviting a friend.\nTo get an unlimited number of transactions, please purchase the app.

Privacy Policy for Journal Book App

Last Updated: September 13, 2025

Thank you for using the Journal Book app. Your privacy is important to us, and this policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.

1. Data We Collect

To provide our services, we collect the following types of data:

  • Personal Data: Your name, email, phone number, and address (optional), which you provide when setting up your profile.
  • Financial Data: Account names, account types, currencies, and details of financial transactions (amounts, dates, details) that you enter.
  • Synchronization Data: A copy of your financial and personal data is securely stored on Google Firestore servers to enable synchronization between your devices and to keep a backup.
  • Location Data (One-time): When you first register, we request one-time access to your approximate geographical location to automatically determine your local currency. We do not store or track your location after this process.

2. How We Use Your Data

When you use the app, we may ask you to provide certain personal information, which may include but is not limited to the following purposes:

  • To provide and operate the app: To enable you to use all app features, including creating financial transactions, managing your personal data, and saving data.
  • To manage your account, apply license restrictions (such as the two-device limit per account), and track your subscription status (free/premium).
  • To enable secure cloud synchronization.
  • To send you important notifications regarding app updates, new features, or promotional messages (if you agree to receive them).
  • To display rewarded ads within the app, which allow you to access additional features. This is done in collaboration with ad providers.
  • To protect the app and its users from fraudulent or unauthorized activities.
  • To comply with applicable legal and regulatory requirements.
  • To generate reports and invoices in PDF format.
  • To secure your app via password or fingerprint.
  • To activate the password recovery feature by uploading a file to your personal Google Drive account (with your explicit consent each time).

3. Data Sharing

We do not sell or share your personal or financial data with any third party for marketing purposes. Your data is only stored on Google\'s secure infrastructure (Firebase Authentication, Firestore) and your own Google Drive account (for the password recovery feature).

4. Data Security

We take the security of your data seriously:

  • Cloud synchronization uses strict security rules to ensure that no one can access your data but you.
  • The app lock password is stored locally on your device only and is not synchronized with the cloud.
  • Fingerprint data is handled securely by the Android system itself and is not stored in the app.

5. Data Retention and Deletion

Your data is retained as long as your account is active. You can delete your accounts and transactions at any time through the app, and they will be deleted from the local and cloud databases upon the next synchronization.

6. Contact Us

If you have any questions regarding this privacy policy, you can contact us through the means available in the "Contact & Support" section within the app.

Failed to start the purchase process

Welcome!

To start using the app and add your accounts, tap (+) at the bottom of the screen and enter the account name. When you proceed to add the amount, a dialog will appear for adding account details. Fill in the details, select the account type, and save it.
- Complete the rest of the transaction details.
- Choose the "For You" or "On You" buttons according to the transaction type ‚Äî it will be saved automatically.

**For more instructions, open the side menu, select ‚ÄúHelp,‚Äù and read all the details.**

Do you like the app?

üåü We‚Äôd love to hear your feedback to improve your experience!
Please rate the app and share your comments or suggestions on the review page ‚Äî every rating helps us enhance the features that matter most to you.
